name: Wholesale prescription drug distributor license
text:
[§461-8.6]  Wholesale prescription drug distributor license.  It shall be unlawful for any person to operate, maintain, open, change location, or establish any wholesale prescription drug distribution business within the State without first having obtained a license from the board. [L 1992, c 196, §3]
 
Cross References
 
  Regulation of wholesale prescription drug distributors, see chapter 328, pt VII.
